unnormalised: Guys, auto expo season is heating up! We've got a bunch of vehicle launches hitting the Indian market, from budget-friendly hatchbacks to dream SUVs.
normalised: Guys, auto expo season is heating up! We've got a bunch of vehicle launches hitting the Indian market, from budget-friendly hatchbacks to dream S U Vs.

unnormalised: First up, Maruti Suzuki is rumored to be dropping a new Alto 800 variant with a CNG option, expected to give even better mileage than before. Perfect for those crazy Delhi commutes!
normalised: First up, Maruti Suzuki is rumored to be dropping a new Alto eight hundred variant with a C N G option, expected to give even better mileage than before. Perfect for those crazy Delhi commutes!

unnormalised: Then, Mahindra is teasing something BIG around Diwali. Speculation is rife it's the Thar 5-door. Finally! More space for your chai and samosa runs to Lonavala.
normalised: Then, Mahindra is teasing something B I G around Diwali. Speculation is rife it's the Thar five-door. Finally! More space for your chai and samosa runs to Lonavala.

unnormalised: Tata Motors isn't sitting idle either. Buzz is around an electric version of the Nexon, boasting a 400 km range. Say goodbye to range anxiety on those long highway drives to Rajasthan!
normalised: Tata Motors isn't sitting idle either. Buzz is around an electric version of the Nexon, boasting a four hundred kilometer range. Say goodbye to range anxiety on those long highway drives to Rajasthan!

unnormalised: And hold your horses, Dr. Reddy's nephew just spotted a Hyundai Creta facelift testing near IIT Bombay! Expect sharper looks and maybe even ADAS features.
normalised: And hold your horses, Doctor Reddy's nephew just spotted a Hyundai Creta facelift testing near I I T Bombay! Expect sharper looks and maybe even A D A S features.

unnormalised: Plus, there are whispers of a Royal Enfield Himalayan 450 launch soon. Get ready to conquer those Ladakh passes!
normalised: Plus, there are whispers of a Royal Enfield Himalayan four hundred and fifty launch soon. Get ready to conquer those Ladakh passes!

unnormalised: These launches are gonna be EPIC. Expect showrooms to be packed tighter than a Mumbai local train during rush hour. Get ready to shell out some serious Rs. and maybe even fight for parking in showrooms smaller than 100 sq ft. Gear up, folks!
normalised: These launches are gonna be E P I C. Expect showrooms to be packed tighter than a Mumbai local train during rush hour. Get ready to shell out some serious rupees and maybe even fight for parking in showrooms smaller than one hundred square feet. Gear up, folks!
